${ModID}:Astra.NAME: Astra
${ModID}:Astra.DESCRIPTION: starlight:Project !M! cards. NL Gain !B! Block for each starlight:Projected [#efc851]Magick[] card.

${ModID}:Balance.NAME: Balance
${ModID}:Balance.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Remove all Block from the enemy. NL Deal that much damage.{!Location!|0= NL (Deals !D! damage)}
${ModID}:Balance.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@}Remove all Block from the enemy. NL Deal that much damage to ALL enemies.{!Location!|0= NL (Deals !D! damage)}

${ModID}:Bio.NAME: Bio
${ModID}:Bio.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply Poison equal to unblocked damage dealt.

${ModID}:Dark.NAME: Dark
${ModID}:Dark.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Ignores Block. NL If this kills an enemy, gain [E] [E].

${ModID}:Deduce.NAME: Deduce
${ModID}:Deduce.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Scry !M!. NL Draw 1 card.

${ModID}:Fortify.NAME: Fortify
${ModID}:Fortify.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL starlight:Tag_Team: Draw !M! cards.

${ModID}:FutureSight.NAME: Future Sight
${ModID}:FutureSight.DESCRIPTION: Scry !M!. NL starlight:Project the top card of your draw pile.

${ModID}:Haste.NAME: Haste
${ModID}:Haste.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Gain !B! Block. NL Next turn, NL gain {!M!|1=[E]|2=[E] [E]|3=[E] [E] [E]|@=!M! [E]} and draw !M! additional card{!M!|>1=s}.

${ModID}:Holy.NAME: Holy
${ModID}:Holy.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deals double damage to Elite and Boss enemies.

${ModID}:Imperil.NAME: Imperil
${ModID}:Imperil.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Weak. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable.

${ModID}:Meteor.NAME: Meteor
${ModID}:Meteor.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Deals double damage if starlight:Projected.

${ModID}:Prepare.NAME: Prepare
${ModID}:Prepare.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL starlight:Tag_Team: Gain !M! starlight:SP.

${ModID}:Protect.NAME: Protect
${ModID}:Protect.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Put the next card you play this turn on top of your draw pile.

${ModID}:Quake.NAME: Quake
${ModID}:Quake.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. Reduce this card's cost by !M! this combat.

${ModID}:Reflect.NAME: Reflect
${ModID}:Reflect.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Whenever you are attacked this turn, deal !M! damage back.

${ModID}:Shell.NAME: Shell
${ModID}:Shell.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Block is not removed at the start of your next turn.

${ModID}:SpellWeaver.NAME: Spell Weaver
${ModID}:SpellWeaver.DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 card. NL If you draw a starlight:Magick card, gain !M! starlight:SP.

${ModID}:TeamEffort.NAME: Team Effort
${ModID}:TeamEffort.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you trigger a starlight:Tag_Team effect, gain !M! Block.

${ModID}:Thoughtbloom.NAME: Thoughtbloom
${ModID}:Thoughtbloom.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw a starlight:Magick card, gain !M! starlight:SP.

${ModID}:Thunder.NAME: Thunder
${ModID}:Thunder.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !M! Vulnerable to ALL enemies.
